entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in Forillon Park this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm in Forillon Park. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in Forillon Park. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm in Forillon Park. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
